title: UConnâ€™s Paige Bueckers Tears A.C.L. and Will Miss Season
description: The all-American guard, who sustained the injury in a pickup basketball game, will have surgery on her left knee on Friday, the university said.
dc:creator: Adam Zagoria
media:credit: Kirby Lee/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Paige Bueckers returned from a long injury absence to lead UConn to the national championship game last season.
